meanings.definition: Projecting horizontally from a wall or other support.
meanings.sent1: The cantilevering shelf provided extra space in the small room.
meanings.sent2: The cantilevering beam extended outwards from the building.
meanings.sent3: The cantilevering light fixture looked like it was floating in mid-air.
meanings.sent4: The cantilevering balcony seemed to defy gravity.
meanings.sent5: The cantilevering structure gave the building a unique appearance.

meanings.definition: To support by a cantilever or cantilevers.
meanings.sent1: The engineer was cantilevering the platform to the side of the building.
meanings.sent2: They were cantilevering the sign over the entrance of the store.
meanings.sent3: He cantilevered the umbrella over his head to shield himself from the sun.
meanings.sent4: The tree branches cantilevered outwards, providing shade below.
meanings.sent5: She cantilevered the bookshelf against the wall for support.
